message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor, given the inflation rates.
You wanted a 60/40 split, I'll give you 30, now it's your turn to be generous!
Okay, let's compromise. I'll take 45, and you can have 55. We both have to be flexible to get something.
You're getting closer to my end of the spectrum, but I still think you can give up a bit more. This is my last generous offer!
